channel.title: Comments on: Foursquare, Fight To Be Mayor

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/05/05/foursquare-fight-to-be-mayor/#comment-3415">Beau</a>.
You know, I'm pretty sure a re-enactment of that video with you and Niall at the pier would be very popular ;-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Beau.

You know, I’m pretty sure a re-enactment of that video with you and Niall at the pier would be very popular ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Beau
item.dc:creator: Beau
item.description: I assume I'm the awesome dude in the white suit with the stylish sunglasses. And let's all just note who's currently the mayor. BOOM!
item.content:encoded: I assume I’m the awesome dude in the white suit with the stylish sunglasses. And let’s all just note who’s currently the mayor. BOOM!

item.title: By: Joseph Scott

item.description:

Just picture Niall and Beau with wrists tied together :-)

item.description: Haha, fabulous, I can just imagine...
